website_summaries.verdict: This lower-wattage lamp keeps your fingers comfortable, but be sure to double-check the time and wattage requirements on your nail gel.
pros: UV and LED dual-light source cures almost all nail gel types
Can cure five fingers or toes at once
cons: May take longer than expected for polish to dry
If so, consider running a cotton ball soaked with nail polish remover or rubbing alcohol over the nail like they do at the salon

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable nail dryer that works quickly, but it may not hold up as well over the long run.
pros: Just plug in and it's ready to use
Cures nails in as little as 30 seconds
cons: Not as well-constructed as comparable nail dryers

customer_reviews.title: ... from Ulta instead of buying the entire $100 kit- best decision ever
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this light along with some gel polishes from Ulta instead of buying the entire $100 kit- best decision ever!!! After everything, I ended up spending about $50-60 to get everything mostly because this light was so cheap. It works great! I've only used it for three manis so far but I have yet to have any issues with it. It paid for itself after the first use and I'm beyond excited that I get to do salon quality manis that cost upwards of $55 whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Givens

customer_reviews.title: Works w Polygel!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if it was going to be strong enough to work w polygel but it totally is. I cured for 60 seconds each new nail. I did my nails 5 days ago and everything is still intact! So happy w this affordable purchase! Added Crystals w hard gel and that worked too! My first time doing polygel so don’t judge me too hard 🙃😋
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Get a bottle of 90% alcohol to seal
customer_reviews.text: NEVER GOING BACK TO THE NAIL SALON!! This is PERFECT!!! Depending on which brand of gel polish you use you will need alcohol to seal it, otherwise you’ll be left with the “sticky” stuff after curing. I am so excited to be saving AT LEAST $1,200 a year!! I will be ordering another one for my sisters.
customer_reviews.author: ANTONIA

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little led uv light!!! I’m so happy I bought this. My nails grow quickly so keeping up with them can be expensive. I decided to try an “at home” gel manicure and the results surprised me! This thing is the best and you can’t beat the price!! It’s a nice shape and design so I don’t have to worry about smacking my nails on the top of the light and ruining them like I do at the salon. Cures the polish nicely!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I had such a fun girls night doing our nails with this lamp. I was impressed and wowed when we found out it had an auto detect sensor. It's so simple to use and I love the white pearl finish. It's beautiful and works well. We used it for 30 second intervals for each coat of polish and sealed the top for a min and half. No regrets here. Plus I love that a whole hand fits and it's still not nearly as bulky as the ones at the nail salons.
customer_reviews.author: Livyguts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: Start to finish 25 minutes. Lamp was just what I needed. First time doing gel nails at home and I LOVE the outcome. Salon results!!! I purchased the soak off base and top coats from Gellen as well as the 6 set Gellen soak off color set.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ranahan

customer_reviews.title: 1 to 2 min per coat does the job
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems with this lamp. I do find that 30 seconds is too short for most coats. I do 60 seconds for base coat and color polish coats, and 2 minutes for top coat. My manicures come out salon perfect as long as I brush on the base coat smoothly and wipe off all the tackiness after curing. Minus 1 star because I wish every coat would cure in 30 seconds, but that doesn't happen for me. I mostly use Sally Hansen gel polish and Gelish Foundation and Top Coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K.

customer_reviews.title: Love This!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it three times since I bought it and it works fast. 120 per coat is all it takes to have nice nails. Thank you😊
customer_reviews.author: T. Day

customer_reviews.title: Super Quick & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last week. I order several kits of gel nail polish and painted my nails yesterday. The light has motion detection. It offers two options to use 30 seconds or 60 seconds timeframe for the light on your nails to dry the polish. Using this light it only took me 20 minutes to do my nails, which beats 2 hours at the nail salon! Check Out my Instagram for the results of my nails and be sure to follow to see my latest amazon try-on hauls and reviews @skylerelexisallred.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce & Skyler

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the performance of this product, considering the price. I am nail tech and have tried this product out with gelish no chip polish, entity gel polish and luxe gels. I've had no problem with it curing any of these products. I love how small and manuverable it is. My coworkers and clients liked it so much we bought a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: shauna bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time doing my own gel manicure, and I was photobombed by my cat. I used OPI gel soak off polish. 30 secs for base, thin layers and 30 seconds for both coats of polish, and 90 seconds for the top coat. (I’m sure 60 would have been fine, but I was being extra). I also wiped with cleaner at the end to get that smooth shiny finish like at the nail salon. Very happy with this at home product. Works fast and gentle. I didn’t feel any intense tingling like at the professional places. Seriously great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great. Easy to use and plug in. The only thing is the cord is not long.
customer_reviews.author: John Fifi

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Larger than expected. I use it for crafting with UV resin and works great b
customer_reviews.author: Penguinns

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent timer
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK product. Probably better for just traditional nail polish. It does NOT cure gel polish even if I do extra time. Also the 60 sec timer is definitely not 60 sec. Sometimes the light turns off and you have to turn back on, which i believe is normal with a timer but sometimes it STAYS on until you remove your hand. Which i believe is normal with some lights but this particular light just is not consistant with how it works/how long light stays on. Guess thats why it's so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: since everyone else seems to love it. I’ve tried FOUR times with very specific ...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell if this works, since everyone else seems to love it. I’ve tried FOUR times with very specific instructions form videos and google on how to do gel polish and I always end up with an air bubble forming underneath the gel within ten minutes. I can easily peel the polish off. When I’ve had gel professionally done it’s nearly impossible to peel off without destroying the nail. I use FingerPaints gel polish base coat, fingerpaints or asp gel polish for color (from Sally’s), and Gelaze top coat. I cure after each coat, make the coats thin, and finish the top coat with a swipe from an alcohol swab. I’m so frustrated this doesn’t work for me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: gBizzle

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. I was really hoping this would work and ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I was really hoping this would work and cure my nails better than the sensationail lamp. And maybe it would have. But it wouldn't turn on and when it did it only flashed on for a second and then died. Searching on for one that will work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but results don’t last
customer_reviews.text: It works great and easy to use but my polish does not last. I want to try it with a different brand of gel before I criticize but my polish only stays on a day before it peels off wondering if anyone else has this problem or if the problem is the brand of gel I’m using
customer_reviews.author: Rachael D.

customer_reviews.title: Works for my UV resin!
customer_reviews.text: The motion detection doesn’t always work, And to be honest, I didn’t even know there was motion detection until I went to write the review - I actually just thought it was a glitch because it works every now and again. Definitely not a deal breaker for me. I use this for my uh resin and both time setting are too short and I have to keep turning it back on over and over again. Again, not a deal breaker. It’s sleek, it looks good, it’s just the right size. It’s a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: December

customer_reviews.title: Finally I can do my own gel manicure at home!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I want to save money by doing my own gel manicures at home. I read all of the instructions included in the curing lamp, base and top coat, as well as the actual gel polishes before I started the process. I'm happy with the results, not too bad for my first time! I'm leaving for a vacation Thursday morning so I wanted to give it two days to see how my nails do (normal nail polish starts to chip on my nails in one day). As always I was happy with Amazon shipping, I ordered Sunday evening and received my products Monday evening.
customer_reviews.author: DeRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Worked twice, now dead
customer_reviews.text: Made the switch from pros to home manicures because I do a much better job. This light worked for the first two times I used it, now does not cure at all. Kept my hand in for up to 5 minutes, still no cure. Super bummed because it was hard earned money spent on this lamp, which stopped working, and the return period ended, so I am forced to buy another lamp because I have so much gel polish. PLEASE EXCHANGE THIS OUT WITH ANOTHER WORKING LAMP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Nail Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this dryer for over a year and I love this product. I thought only a certain type of fingernail polish could only be used with this product but after testing regular nail polish, they all have no problem drying quicker under the UV dryer. I think this speaks enough about the product. I love the shape of the dryer too, it helps keeping the nails safe from smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Yoricha

customer_reviews.title: My lamp just died and I only had if for 6 Months.
customer_reviews.text: My lamp just died and I only had if for 6 Months. I do nails from home and only work 4 days a week only 4hours a day. I can't believe this thing went out on me in the middle of a service. Luckily I had a backup, but that sure was upsetting. I only give this lamp 3 stars because it is tight in the lamp and its to short for girls with long fingers + nails. And the other star goes away because I thought this lamp was going to last me at least 1 year. I did like the dry time and that it turned on and off when a hand was placed in or out.
customer_reviews.author: OhEverythingHandmade

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: So, I have been trying to figure out why my gel polish peels away from my nails. I have followed steps like filing the nail so the polish adheres better, dehydrating the nail with alcohol, and using a base coat. BUT whatever I do...the polish still pull away or chips ALWAYS within 1 day....So as you can see the layers of gel polish and taking the time to cure between layers is a lot of time wasted when my manicure only lasts 1 day. I can only think that it has to be the light. I think I'll try a lamp that has all LED lights instead of a combo like this one. Pros= easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Knc

customer_reviews.title: This uv light would've been amazing if it would work I received a product that ...
customer_reviews.text: This uv light would've been amazing if it would work I received a product that don't turn on or work properly so unhappy
customer_reviews.author: SexxcciiEve

customer_reviews.title: Love This!  It Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My first time doing my own polygel nails using this product and it does what it's supposed to! The product has an on/off button with 30 sec and 60 sec selection. I believe lights come on automatically when you put your hand in. I used the button to choose the 60 sec selection. I had no issues. The product cured my nails! Love this! Highly recommend. It's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Good but had issues within two months
customer_reviews.text: Good. It’s easy to use and the amount of UV lights in the lamp will make sure your nails are fully cured. It’s light weight, very sleek and elevated enough that your hands or feet won’t be so close to the lights. My only complaint is that after three months I was having issues with the on and off button jamming which made it difficult to change the time setting. I emailed the company and they responded saying they would send me a new one and never did, I messaged them again with no reply, it’s been almost a month since the time I was supposed to be sent a new lamp, beware of this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Needs longer timer.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The timer button has begun to stick and rocks instead of being pressed down like it should. The motion sensor still works but be careful with the button. Works good!! I purchased the lamp to cure some UV resin and it works well to do this. The only downside is that the lamp needs to be set to the 60sec timer about 4-5 times before fully curing a UV resin (thinner coats take longer than an entire resin piece, I'm afraid. The larger resin pieces only need a couple minutes to set). I would definitely purchase this again or recommend to someone I know. I just wish it had a little bit longer time setting, like 90-120 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to bore you with all details. I was really looking forward to receiving this lamp. At the moment I was doing polygel nails. When using the lamp, it turned on. But it would not harden the gel! I put it in more then 10 times, and the gel was still not hardened. I then wanted to return the product but because of covid I couldn’t go return it at the post office so I chose the option where they come pick it up for you. Surprisingly, they didn’t come. I waited for 3 weeks and no one came! Unfortunately, I can’t return the product anymore as the deadline passed. All in all, i’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Used 4 times and more than a half lights are worn out already. I Used a half day and That's it..... I was going to get the second one if that last more than 6 months just like the other UV Gel Light.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo777

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first UV/LED lamp. It weighs practically nothing and is easy to use. My only complaint would be that the cord for the power is a little short but it’s not a deal breaker. It has 30 and 60 second buttons as well as an automatic sensor when you put your hand under the light and take it away. I’ve only used it a few times so I’ll edit my review if anything changes. Edit: Lamp stopped working after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Will&Erin

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second lamp from this seller-the first one served me well for 2-3 years, but I believe the bulbs started to go out because my gel polish was no longer curing completely. No biggie, just snagged one of these when they were marked down on a crazy sale, and now my nails are perfect again! This thing pays for itself over and over. I’ve saved probably thousands of dollars doing my own manicure every two weeks for the last 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Zuro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS, BETTER AND SAFER THAN GEL LAMPS AT NAIL SALONS
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS LAMP. Super lightweight so it's not heavy at all, motion detection is super good so it lets you know when you're done with your nails. I've been using it to do my own nails at home for the past 3 months and I can't complain, I haven't gone to the salon since and I'm so happy. Super inexpensive too, would recommend for any beginner learning how to do gel polish to use this and it's so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Literally paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp has literally paid for itself. Normally I'm REALLY bad at doing my own nails, it looks like a 2nd grader finger painted with every intention of going outside the lines. With gel polish and this little lamp, I can go one finger at a time (yes it takes like 4 hours to do my nails) and they look fantastic when I'm finally done! Also the local salon charges almost $50 for a full set of gel frenchs which I was able to do with this easily.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Finally
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure this nail dryer would work. Boy was I pleasantly suprised that it did. Being that I normally spend almost $100 bucks to get my nails done at the salon this is a welcome relief. The machine came with clear and concise instructions. I suggest following them and letting the nails cure for 90’seconds between each layer. Also, do not touch the nails when you paint them. It will have a stickiness on them after you paint them be sure to wipe them Down with the alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.text: This LED/UV lamp works great! I was a bit skeptical, because of the low price, but many others liked it. My husband ordered it for me for Christmas. I’ve tried this out several times, and it works great! It dries the LED/UV polish very quickly. I like the option of 30 or 60 second dry time, or it just stays on. It also doesn’t get too hot. Not burning me is a plus. :) I’ve tried this on both my fingernails and toenails, and it works just fine. I’m very satisfied and would put this against more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: SouthTexasGal

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this during the quarantine to be able to do my nails. Works great. Used it on fingers and toes. If gel paint is too thick I def will use the 60sec setting 3-4 times. Great purchase and even better way to save money if you can do your own nails!
customer_reviews.author: ANJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on recommendation, and that individual still enjoys their’s. 3 stars because I experience a burning sensation for about two seconds during every cure, which is not something I’d ever experienced before. It would have been 4 stars, because the other person I use this in doesn’t feel the sensation, but I used it on another person and they felt the same burning feeling. It also takes a few minutes to really feel like the polish has cured. Pretty good for the price and gets the job done but not sure I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Diya

customer_reviews.title: Impressed! Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use, open space means no smudges, and can do toes. Keep in mind as soon as you plug it in, it’s on, whether you hit timer button or not. I didn’t realize that, but it’s just like spa type, slide your fingers in and the light turns on. Feels like warm light sometimes, but not hot or uncomfortable at all. Great buy, and works with gel polishes I got.
customer_reviews.author: WorldTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: The speed for drying the nails is really good, I had the oportunity to compare with another one that a friend bought, and i just have to click once with this lamp and that's all, and with my friends lamp, we had to click on the light like 5 times so it was 5 times slower, more than a minute for each hand and each layer. Also when i used to go to a nails place they clicked like 2 times per layer, so its 40 seconds, and this one is the half of time This is a good option for a lamp,
customer_reviews.author: Joana Bitia Mendoza Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs burn out fast
customer_reviews.text: This item was great the first couple of times It was used but after only 6 months and about 7 times of use the bulbs no longer cure my polish. Would definitely invest in a different machine next time that will last longer. I later tried to use cute it for 3x longer than it usually takes me and that worked but 2.5 hours doing my nails is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Reyna

customer_reviews.title: It is a fun little thing to have at home and I believe ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very wary about getting this curing lamp, however for the price that it is I feel as though it works alright. It is what you can expect for spending less than $30. You definitely have to cure each layer for much longer than expected and on occasion it still hasn't hardened my nails enough. It does heat up my nails quite a bit especially with the top layers of nail polish. It is a fun little thing to have at home and I believe in the end you will end up saving SO much money by not having to go to a salon. But don't expect too much from this sun lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nail polish does not chip for over a week!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because all the normal nail polishes that you can buy from Target would last about twenty-four hours before chipping and honestly I was tired appearing about that and I knew if we put a man on the moon 40 years ago that has to be some device that will help keep them from cracking this is the device everyone it's amazing how cheap it is and it's amazing how well it works she'll have her nail polish on for over a week now with no chips highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine but doesn't have enough power to dry
customer_reviews.text: The system looks good, compact pretty issue to figure out but it's not strong enough. The 24W doesn't dry the gel polish fast enough like nail salon machines do. I had to repeat the 30's and 60's settings a few times to get it to dry. It's the powerful enough so I think spending a little bit more on a better model would make more sense.
customer_reviews.author: Stella O.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more time under lamp to properly cure nails
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. In good working condition but I accidentally purchased the lower wattage and my nails did not properly cure. I returned for the 48w LED lamp and I don’t have any issues. If you decide on this model leave your nails under the lamp double the recommended time.
customer_reviews.author: Caramel Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: Going on week 2 with no chips so no need in going back to a professional! I can say I didn't quit like the color pallet mixes so I would suggest ordering a couple color pallets and you're set. Loved this product so much that I ordered another for a friend! High quality, great results and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony EyeCU Reading

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: I have tried curling my nails for 30 secs didn't workout tried 60 and even leaving them under for 2 mins and they still come out sticky and not dried. I though the first two times were just me needing practice but after 3 months and trying to stick my fingers under there for 3+ mins, they are still not dried. Also not happy that I return is only 30 days after deliver date, thats barely even trying out gel nails twice. I couldn't tell if it was me or the products but after three months I can definitely say its the product. save your money.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Died after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Well I really liked this lamp. Easy to use, auto timer. And then it died after 8 months. I was doing my fingers about 2x a month and my toes 1x a month ... just me ... so not a ton of use for the life of the product. The 30-60s light was even staying on while unplugged so I guess I’m lucky my house didn’t catch on fire or something.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S

customer_reviews.title: Great for manicures AND pedicures :)
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased a gelish starter kit at Sally beauty supply and found that my nails would not dry at all. I quickly went onto amazon and ordered this product and was much happier with this product's ability to get the job done. I also like to do gel nail polish on my toes, so this is perfect to just place on top of your foot without risking your toes touching the lamp. Overall, I am veryyyyy pleased with this product and highly recommend it to others who want to save money doing their gel manicures themselves :)
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie L

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner’s lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this lamp, for the price it does it’s job and doesn’t really feel all that cheap! Nice and sturdy, and the colors are cute as well. However, this is not something you charge, it has to stay plugged in. The cord is not attached to the body and the plug is not in a format I recognize, so if I lost the cord I don’t think find a replacement would be easy. However this is a great sturdy little lamp for beginners to gel manicuring.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners and gel polish
customer_reviews.text: This at first I thought was perfect . But then I realized my product on the table was curing and screwing up in my jar . The light reflects out so much that things on your table need to be far away or it will cure . Also Because the light is so lightweight the cord moves the light if your not careful. Love the motion sensor and timer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last even a year
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product until it didn't even last a year! I bought this lamp for home use and maybe use it two to three times a month at the most. I bought it in September and it only lasted until now July 2019. Won't turn on anymore 😡
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. I didn't give it 5 stars because it takes longer to cure my gel than my other dryer. But it's cute and lightweight and small. I'd give it to a teen as a gift. It took two to three times more time to cure the nails. Which is surprising because you definitely feel the heat coming from the lights so I'm not sure why that is. So if you do not mind the extra time fine. If you do not have the space ..this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Hill

customer_reviews.title: Peeling the third day
customer_reviews.text: I am worried this light is not strong enough for me. I have been doing everything I am supposed to, prepping the nail, cleansing, dehydrating, primer, thin layers, capping the free edge, top coat..Even letting them go through the Dryer two and three times for each layer. I am still having issues with them lifting VERY quickly. I am going to try and change some of my products and see if that does anything. I will post update when I do so.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and worked great with the poly gel kit I bought! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a year now and I love it. Super easy to use, light weight, and works perfectly. I’ve been doing my nails with gel polish for a long time now. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Baker

customer_reviews.title: I can’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp over a year ago, i am writing this review now because i am looking for a new one and this one is still the best seller, why? I don’t know. It doesn’t cure any of my gel polish, it’s pretty upsetting because i invested in many gel polishes, etc and none of them work with lamp, i got the gellen ones, anyway i am very disappointed because i can’t wear my gel if i don’t pay at a salon. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sunsetchaser

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: While it's cute and lightweight it did not work to my liking. Applying even the base coat, it wouldn't dry my nails. The lights are not strong enough. Maybe it was the brand of nail polish but regardless what should have taken minimal time took over an hour and a half and my nails were still not fully dry. Returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: emjayhigs85

customer_reviews.title: I thought it wasn’t going to work BUT
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always gotten my nails done at salons and I finally decided to purchase this UV LIGHT. My mom used it and has gotten a lot of compliments then I finally used it and at first I was thought it wasn’t working. I applied GELLENS BASE COAT and tried to cure it but It kept feeling really sticky , I decided to apply the gel polish I was going to use cured it then one last coat then cured again , finally put the top coat and cured and it dried and looked amazing. I was impressed. I thinking you should buy this if you been thinking about but be more patience bc I wasn’t at first.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Just like the salon
customer_reviews.text: If your a precise painter, this is def worth purchasing. You have to make sure you file the nail and apply a base coat for longer lasting nails. Also wipe excess or when the paint hardens, it will scratch you or peel off completely. I tried once with a base and once without. Without base coat the polish peels in 2 days. With a base coat lasts 2-3 weeks! My toes lasted 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Oct 7, stopped working by Nov 30
customer_reviews.text: This light was delivered on October 7, 2018 and it stopped working by November 30, 2018...didn’t even last 2 months. I stored it in it’s original box in my closet, so I know it was not broken in my house. The few times that the light did work, it didn’t fully cure the polish. For Halloween, I tried to do a nice shiny black gel which was a huge fail because the light would not cure it at all. It’s a piece of junk. Don’t waste your money. My photo shows the 30 second light activated but the curing lights do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light due to the fact that I would get my nails done and less than a week later I’d have chips. I believe that gel nails if done well, should last two weeks. With this said I am very hard on my nails, and never wear gloves. So I did the math, and for the cost of going to the nail salon twice, I could pay for all the supplies I needed to do my own nails. That was the best decision I made. I couldn’t be happy with the results. The best part is if I do get a chip it’s within my power to repair it. I love this light!❤️
customer_reviews.author: mrsfixit

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of what you're buying because you never know how much are going to get
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for 2 years practically going on 3 and it randomly stopped working I don't know why and I don't know how but it's kind of irritating the fact that you spend your money on something that you think is going to work for a long period of time and then it up and just quits working on you out of nowhere especially when you're wanting to do your nails I had been satisfied with my product up until this point
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Would give 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best investment I think I've ever bought myself. I was used to a tiny UV lamp that took a totally of 30 minutes with ever layer of polish included in that time(3 mins each layer). Well this lamp takes 30 seconds per layer and I am amazed. Love love love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do. It comes on automatically when you insert your hand and stays on the full minute if you don't choose a timer. It has a 30 second or 1 minute timer if you choose to set it. I wish I had ordered 2 of them. Maybe one day I will purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first but my hairdresser recommended this product to me. Her nails always looked professionally done, even her toes. She said she bought this product and it was so easy to use in the comfort of your own home. After 2 uses (including the cost of the gel polishes, base and top coats) the product pays for itself. No lines, no payment, no hassle...on your own time in your PJ's if you wished! :) Im so happy with it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mary a corralez

customer_reviews.title: This works great. My only complaint is the polish I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My only complaint is the polish I use says to put under the light for 120 seconds (I've tried less and its not done sooner.) This has a 30 second and a 60 second button. So i have to remember to press it twice. Not a huge deal but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wasson

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My first time buying a led/uv light and its pretty good. I am good with doing 60sec with my no chip polishes!! I will definitely be buying another one for backup. Doesnt feel like your fingers burn or anything so def recommend for beginners and not sure which one to buy this is the one! Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. Used it three times now, only comment is to pay attention to consecutive uses. Let it "cool off" between curing phases, can be warm when you go to put it away. Could use a longer cord, I have had to use an extension cord for every use, but thats because I wanted to use it in a comfy location at least 10 feet from an outlet. Was very happy with the number of lights it had, provides excellent coverage to to all five nails.
customer_reviews.author: lauran

customer_reviews.title: Great UV Light
customer_reviews.text: This UV light has plenty of room for your hand without worrying about hitting the sides and messing up your nails. The motion detector is perfect so you don't have to touch anything and possibly ding your nails. I love how lightweight and easy it is to store too.
customer_reviews.author: Moosegirl67

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once so far but I really like it. The motion detection does work. It cures just like at a salon and it dried everything perfectly. Since this was my first time using gel on my own I didn’t do the greatest job. I got a pretty big blob in one of my nails and it even cured that. That thing was hard as a rock. It was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Breena B.

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this product. This is the first time I'm using a UV lamp for gel polish nails at home. I'm so glad I bought this handy lamp. I'm in my fourth week of a beautiful and long lasting nail polish. I prepped my nails with a gentle filing all over. Then I washed my hands with soap and water and rubbed a bit of regular mail polish remover on my nails before I applied the gel polish. This really works! My nails have grown out to a nice length and feel very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...bulbs burn out fast
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first.....but as time went by the light bulbs started burning out. I’ve had multiple lights and I’ve never had this problem before. It started out with 18 lights and after about 25 uses I’m now left with 8 lights. I’ve had other brands that had bulbs that never ever ran out. Will never buy this light or brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Love

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am a beginner when it comes to gel manicures and was looking for something that is easy to use. This worked perfect! Very straightforward. I also bought beetles gel polish and it was exactly what I was looking for. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking to start doing their own gel manicures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cures fast, good quality, fits whole hand/foot
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I love love love this light. I have been doing my own gel nails for the past 3+ years and i had a small gelish brand light that i bought from sally's and i never realized how crappy it was until i tried this light. It cures my nails SO fast. I'm talking 30 seconds fast. Im so happy with this purchase. I wish i ordered it sooner!! Worth every penny. I think its super cool how it automatically turns on when you put your hand/foot under it lol. Also, my whole hand fits which i am so happy about because my old light only fit my 4 fingers. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BUY A HIGHER WATTAGE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is light weight, and the motion sensor is great, but if your going to spend the money, definitely purchase one with a higher wattage. I have tried this with several different gel nail polishes and it has always taken many many times under the drier, takes forever to dry, and dry is an over statement, nine times out of ten, it ends up just sticky. If it does dry, it just peels off the next day. Not worth the money at all, spend the extra money and get the higher wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N.

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few rounds to dry
customer_reviews.text: This product is really light-weight, sleek, and cute. I love the option of having a two-option timer for both 30 and 60 seconds with automatic shut off. It also has the ability to motion-detect your hand if you just want to stick it under the UV light without using the timer function. All-in-all it was worth the price and it functions as it should. Downfall, you have to cure the gel polish a few times each coat for it to completely dry. Not sure I like the idea of exposing myself to that many rounds of UV light, but hey, they wattage is lower than some others so that may be why. I would recommend and continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Loses power after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about the first 10 times I used it. Then it started losing power, and it took like 2-3 minutes for each layer to dry. Amazon’s return policy is only 30 days, but I feel like this product should last longer than just a few months. I’m disappointed and will have to purchase another lamp to do my nails. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Was skeptical that I could actually get a salon gel manicure at home. Believe the hype! The lamp cured the gel like a champ. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have used this lamp 5x and it just stopped working. Now all it does is just blink once no mater what timer I’m using. I bought this in June btw. It’s now November of the same year less than 6 months later it’s broken
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Miniature.. hand wont fit BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO much smaller than depicted... its so small that the entire hand doesnt even fit under the light. After one use its so stressful all of the nails didnt cure at an even rate why because this thing us literally MINIATURE. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: l.Rodway

customer_reviews.title: Newbie to Gel Manicures
customer_reviews.text: I am a newbie to manicures in general. So the concept of gel manicures were foreign to me. My coworker educated me on them and so I jumped right in and decided to do them myself. I spent days reading reviews on different lamps and gels. I ultimately chose this one due to price and number of positive reviews. I have to say, I am addicted. My nails are done so fast! Lamp is so easy to use. Fits whole hand under lamp. No need to do thumb separate. Mad I didn’t invest in this a long time ago. If you are scared, don’t be. Take the leap and get this one!
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Not for  shellac
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product with Cnd shellac and another brand of soak off polish. Results at first are great but the polish always ends up separating. My salon friend says it's because the light is too week. This product may be great for other gels but not shellac...
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp! Love the size of it and how great it works!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging on this was perfect and the UV light was well Protected. It is large enough to where it fits all of your nails yet small enough to be portable. It fits great in my travel nail bag and works fantastic! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: N. Stickles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This works SO well. I’ve had other lights in the past that did not work very well and this one is top notch. I like that it doesn’t have a bottom so you can use it for gel pedicures. Great product and I highly recommend it for home manicures!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Young

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant about ordering this. After hours of researching the best or as close to the best I finally decided on this uv/led lamp and I’m very satisfied with it. It’s easy to use, light weight and even cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Thiara

customer_reviews.title: Great nail lamp
customer_reviews.text: This nail lamp is great. The preset buttons make it easy, just press whatever one your gel needs for curing, put your hand in, when the light goes off your done. I love having the times preset for you, takes the guessing or waiting for a clock to count down , out of the equation for you. I didn't have a problem curing any of my gels. Overall it is a great lamp and I would definitely recommend it to my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice, pretty, and light nail dryer. However, it not cure the nails for me and I even tried leaving under for longer than recommend. I would not recommend this product to anyone. I couldn’t do any nails until my other lamp came in!
customer_reviews.author: Teanna R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pedis
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple light for pedicures because the light I use in manicures weighs a ton! I love this light, it works great for the feet. If you do hands with it, do the thumbs separately. I love this light though, it’s great a great price
customer_reviews.author: Casey Austin

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is legit! it's the perfect size!! It's great for hands and toes! I am able to do my nails and toenails with no issues! this light is legit!! I've had it for almost a year with no complaints!! Seriously get this light!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like, but it takes longer than you expect
customer_reviews.text: At a normal salon, you can just keep your hand under here for a minute in between polish coats and it does the trick. This is something I would need to use for 3-5 minutes or more. It's always hard to tell because my nails will still seem sticky afterwards. Sometimes I just rinse my nails under ice cold water to help them dry even more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Unsure about this product.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason after using a Top Coat gel and I put my fingers under the UV light. It burns the nails so much that I have to quickly take my hands from underneath the light and literally ease my fingers back under the light very slowly. Not sure why this happens and I'm using a Gel base, Gel top coat and Gel polish. Also, it doesn't seem to dry quickly. I kept doing sets of 30 seconds then 60 seconds and my nails were still not dry. Unsure if I'm doing something wrong or not. I've used this product twice since I purchased it days ago and my results turned out the same.
customer_reviews.author: Starsha Carter

customer_reviews.title: Like this so far!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with the Aimeili gel nail polish. Used it today the first time and it worked great. The lamp will come on automatically when you put your hand under it, but if you want a specific time (30 or 60 seconds), cycle through the options with the button on top. For the cost of a salon manicure, I was able to buy this and the base, top and color coats! It did take me a long time to do the prep stage, but looks good!
customer_reviews.author: ShopperMJ

customer_reviews.title: It didn't really work.
customer_reviews.text: I'd sit and sit and sit doing it over and over. Then, an hour or two later, thinking my nails were more than dry- they weren't and would smudge. Plus, these say not to put your hand under too much because it may cause cancer. ???
customer_reviews.author: Robert Legreid

customer_reviews.title: ... how many times I’ve used this already and I love it. Very modern look and real cute
customer_reviews.text: Idk how many times I’ve used this already and I love it. Very modern look and real cute. Also, perfect size. Only issue I have with it is that it’s too sensitive. Once I plug it in, it turns on without me clicking on the 30/60sec button. I then click on the buttons for it to turn off and it turns back on if flinch next to it. Too sensitive and it does get irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for three manicures so far. Love this thing! Gets the job done FAST! I don't think I'll ever go back to non-gel polish again. I'm amazed that I can give myself a fancy manicure in about 40 minutes and BOOM, nails are dry and I can go about my day. I ordered this lamp because of the good reviews, the 24W (higher than others), and the fact that it's dual LED/UV. I just might order another one for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Peterman

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT CURE HIGH PIGMENT GELS
customer_reviews.text: if you are using very highly pigmented (eg. better quality, black or neon colors) gels this lamp will not cure them. It takes way too long to cure the cheaper gels too. This is not at all suitable for professional use. I bought it to start cosmetology school before I knew what to look for and I will be donating it since the return window has closed. It caused me so much frustration until I finally realized that the problem was 100% the lamp. I have since used lower wat, cheaper lamps that cure better/ faster than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is super easy to use and cures my gel polish perfectly! The only thing is the motion sensor thingy can be kind of picky about how far in your hand needs to be. But I usually just hit the timer on the top and do it that way. Very happy with this lamp and the price! Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail yesterday. Packaged very nicely and securely. I use gelish brand uv polish and did each coat for the 99 second automatic timer. I was also able to do my whole hand at once, yay! This cut my nail polishing time by 2/3!!! I’ve been doing gel nails for about 5-6 years now and I’m so glad I finally upgraded my lamp. In the pic I circled the lights that do your thumbs so you can see you can do your whole hand. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ashar

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I found myself spending $35 a pop on shellac every second week, until a girl I know told me about this. I bought it the next day, alongside a CND Shellac color and a gel base and top coat. After using it people asked me had I gotten my nails done! It's so easy to use, the only tricky part may be applying the polish evenly, but the top gel coat makes it look smooth and shiny no matter what! Invest in two colors to begin with, otherwise you'll end up wearing the same color for 2 months straight... Also maybe dot on a bit of SPF on your hands because you have them directly underneath a UV light!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a year now. It has held up well over time & has never given me any trouble. I take good care of it & it has worked perfectly. Love doing my own gel polish at home. Saves me time & money. I bought this one although my old one worked fine because this one is small, light & travels with me easily.
customer_reviews.author: Seriously🤔

product_meta.title: UV LED Nail Lamp,SUNUV Gel UV Light Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish 24W Curing Lamp with Sensor 2 Timer SUN9C(Pink)
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE SUPERIOR NAIL DRYER: Professional designed UV+LED dual light source, SUNUV SUN9C nail dryer its light is closer to white light, has no harm to eyes and skin, durable 50000hrs lifetime. This is a nail dryer can help you to solve almost all the curing problem, ideal for both home and salon use!
CURING ALMOST ALL NAIL GELS: LED gels, UV gels, including Hard Gels, buildings, sculpture gel, gem glue etc..No brand requirements. Easy to use, just plug in and you are ready to go.
FAST AND COMFORTABLE: It is low wattage but quick-drying which can shorten your curing time by 50% or overheat than others dryers. Quick and quiet, NO NEED ANY FANS.
MUTIFUNCTIONAL AND ADJUSTABLE: For curing fingernail or toenail and with automatic sensor for curing 99s or 2 timing setting 30s/60s. Enjoy nail art at anytime and anywhere.
WHAT YOU GET: SUNUV SUN9C nail dryer provides Friendly Customer Service at any times. If there is any issues, please feel free to reach us directly. Customer satisfaction is our first target.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,001 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
